_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Kerbal Space Program - DMP Mod
author: info@goover.de
description:
DMP is a Multiplayer Mod for Kerbal Space Program.

With it its now possible to watch other peoples Spacetape Art while it crashes or Fly with them to the moon

installation.script:
apt update
apt install -y wget unzip curl

cd /mnt/server

# download the files
curl -L https://d-mp.org/builds/release/v${VERSION}/DMPServer.zip > DMPServer.zip
curl -L https://d-mp.org/builds/updater/DMPUpdater.exe > DMPUpdater.exe
curl -L https://d-mp.org/builds/updater/DMPModpackUpdater.exe > DMPModpackUpdater.exe
curl -L https://d-mp.org/builds/reporting/DMPServerListReporter.dll > DMPServerListReporter.dll

unzip DMPServer.zip
rm -f DMPServer.zip

chmod +x DMPUpdater.exe
chmod +x DMPModpackUpdater.exe

# move config to root and remove folder
mv -f /mnt/server/DMPServer/* /mnt/server
rm -fR /mnt/server/DMPServer

# create config
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Config
mkdir -p /mnt/server/logs
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Plugins
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Universe

curl -L https://github.com/gOOvER/goover-eggs/raw/main/kspdmp/Settings.txt > /mnt/server/Config/Settings.txt

rm -fR /mnt/server/DMPServer
